tips.name: Cadaver Counter Badge
tips.content: Defeat the Vahzilok leader in the Death from Below Sewer Trial without killing any of the Cadavers. That means no AOE, Sands of Mu is an AOE, park/dismiss your pets, all damage on Dr. Meinst till she is down.

tips.name: The Cleanser Badge
tips.content: Defeat all the Lost Worshippers in the Death from Below Sewer Trial before defeating the Lost leader.

name: Positron 1 Task Force: Rule of Three

tips.name: Ruin Mages
tips.content: Ruin mages cast earthquake and shields. Take them out first.

tips.name: Mission: Save Atlas Park!
tips.content: We just need to recuse the hostages, but wait before approaching the city hall steps.

tips.name: City Hall Ambush
tips.content: Do not step onto the city hall entrance stairs or touch the door till we are ready. Or you will trigger the ambush early.

tips.name: Doppelgangers
tips.content: These are boss level copies of our team. Including all the buffs and debuffs.

tips.name: Ruin Mages
tips.content: Ruin mages cast earthquake and shields. Take them out first.

tips.name: Activate Obelisks
tips.content: There are eight obelisks that need to be clicked. Then the hostage door will open.

tips.name: Volcanic Badge
tips.content: Defeat 100 Magmite Lords.

tips.name: Sidereal Researcher Badge
tips.content: Click on all four glowing meteors during the Drowning in Blood Trial in Bloody Bay after speaking with an NPC on the Boardwalk, either: a Night Widow spy (Villains) or a Longbow Scientist (Heroes).

tips.name: Brotherly Love Badge
tips.content: You defeated both Shivan Obliterators at the end of Drowning in Blood within 30 seconds of each other.

name: Synapse: The Fall of the Clockwork King

tips.name: Babbage
tips.content: The monster Babbage will appear after outside this mission after completion. Keep an eye out.

name: Virgil Tarikoss: The Beast Beneath the Mountain Strike Force

tips.name: Mission: Find Method to Pierce Barrier
tips.content: We need to kidnap the portal tech and lead them to the computer.

tips.name: Mission: Bind Bat'Zul
tips.content: Defeat Infernal. Click the five altars. Defeat Bat'Zul, who will spawn in the middle of the map.

name: Penelope Yin Task Force: Clamor for the people

tips.name: Super stunners
tips.content: Have a power called, Reserve Power, which is an autohit hp, end drain, and recovery debuff on defeat with a 25' radius. Kill at range to avoid.

tips.name: Final mission: Pull the side rooms
tips.content: We are pulling the side rooms. Beware of how much is being pulled.

tips.name: Final mission: Wait on the computers
tips.content: Please, clear the mobs before clicking the computers.

name: Silver Mantis: Pirates of the Sky
Mortimer Kal: The Fire and the Flames
Admiral Sutter: The Sky is Falling
Ice Mistral: The Crystal of Serafina
Imperious: Time's Arrow
location: Cimerora (via Ouroboros with badge or Midnighter Club with badge)

name: Dr. Quarterfield: Explorers and Exploiters
location: Firebase Zulu (via Tunnel, SG portal, or PI portal)

name: Sara Moore: The Legend of Ruladak
location: Cascade Archipelago (via Tunnel or SG Portal)

name: Justine Augustine: The Saga of Faathim
location: The Chantry (via Tunnel or SG Portal)

name: Faathim the Kind: The Saga of Lanaru
location: The Chantry (via Tunnel or SG Portal)

name: Dr. Khan: Return of the Reichsman
Apex-Tin mage TFs: Alpha Strike and Praetorian Offensive

tips.name: Apex: Rikti Pylons
tips.content: We only need to defeat the three pylons. Watch out for the hydra heads. They do accurate massive toxic AOE damage.

tips.name: Apex: Lore pets
tips.content: Summon your lore pets if you have them.

tips.name: Apex: Battle Maiden fight
tips.content: Blue patches will fall from the sky, they do large amounts of untyped damage, avoid or you will die. Once, Battle Maiden retreats, focus on the humans, ignore the swords.

tips.name: Apex Badge: Drone Protector Badge
tips.content: Ensure no drones are defeated in the first mission.

tips.name: Apex Badge: Burden Bearer Badge
tips.content: Ensure no drones are defeated or activated in the first mission.

tips.name: Apex Badge: Already Dead Badge
tips.content: Defeat Battle Maiden in under 15 minutes (Timer only counts when she is on the map).

tips.name: Tin Mage: Eight War Walkers to Defeat
tips.content: We only need to defeat the eight war walker bosses. Then enter the warehouse near the last two bosses.

tips.name: Tin Mage: Defeat Director 11
tips.content: Keep Director 11 taunted or immobilized. They like to run.

tips.name: Tin Mage Badge: Hacker
tips.content: Click all 8 devices within 30 seconds of entering the warehouse in the first mission.

tips.name: Tin Mage Badge: Midnight Dodger What Dodges At Midnight Badge
tips.content: All teammates must avoid taking any damage from Proximity Bombs set by Director 11 during the first mission. High defense, flight, or just defeating the AV quickly work.

tips.name: Tin Mage Badge: Kitty's Got Claws Badge
tips.content: Defeat Neuron before Bobcat reaches 50% health, then defeat Bobcat.

tips.name: Tin Mage Badge: Army of Neu Badge
tips.content: Defeat 40 of Neuron's clones in one attempt. Separate the AVs, take Bobcat out first. No AOEs till we get the badge.
